DOC.brief_summary: This single blind , single dose , crossover study investigate relative efficacy terbutaline Turbuhaler® 0.4 mg relation salbutamol pressurize Metered Dose Inhaler ( pMDI ) 200 μg Japanese adult asthmatic patients.The secondary objective study investigate safety terbutaline Turbuhaler® 0.4 mg Japanese adult asthma patient mean adverse event ( AEs ) vital sign ( blood pressure , pulse rate ) . The subject population include Japanese patient ( 16 year age old ) asthma need treatment inhaled Glucocorticosteroids ( ICS ) .
DOC.brief_title: To Investigate Relative Efficacy Terbutaline Turbuhaler® Salbutamol Pressurized Metered Dose Inhaler ( pMDI ) Single Blind Study
DOC.criteria: On ICS least 3 month Visit 2 prescribe constant dose 4 week prior Visit 2 Forced Expiratory Volume 1 Second ( FEV1 ) least 50 % predict normal value prebronchodilator Reversible airway obstruction accord reversibility test perform Visit 2 , define increase Forced Expiratory Volume 1 Second ( FEV1 ) ≥12 % relative baseline 1530 minute inhalation total 400 μg salbutamol Treatment oral , parenteral rectal GCS ( Glucocorticosteroids ) within 4 week depot parenteral GCS ( Glucocorticosteroids ) within 3 month prior Visit 2 . Change prescribe asthma medication due exacerbation asthma within 4 week prior Visit 2 hospitalize due exacerbation asthma within 8 week prior Visit 2 .
